actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for adoption expenses in excess of 7.5 percent of adjusted gross income.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction for adoption expenses in excess of 7.5 percent of adjusted gross income.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for adoption expenses in excess of 7.5 percent of adjusted gross income.
